categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Rusty Goffe (born October 30, 1948) is an English actor who played several characters in A New Hope, including Kabe, a Jawa, and a gonk droid. He also later worked with George Lucas on the 1988 film Willow, in which he had an uncredited role as a Nelwyn villager.
